QuoteText: LOL we can't even agree to disagree. Any atempt to write a new constitution would end in the country splitting into several countries.
ResponseText: We forget that at the time of the writing of the Constitution, the country was in danger of splitting and/or disappearing entirely. Perhaps a mortal threat encourages compromise and far-sightedness.

QuoteText: We forget that at the time of the writing of the Constitution, the country was in danger of splitting and/or disappearing entirely. Perhaps a mortal threat encourages compromise and far-sightedness.
ResponseText: I agree to some extent but I still feel amy attempt to alter the document will end in splitting the nation.
